name: CAP
description: CAP is a meme token on the SUI blockchain, encouraging people to "spot and chill", instead of engaging in leverage trading. The token is creating funny and educational content, centered around Cap the Capybara. We are working with a top animation and art studio that is already producing more episodes of our animated series. We have launched an Instagram and Tik Tok page for Cap to spread the message outside crypto circles as well.
